name: Heaven Fell
description:
HEAVEN FELL

An Animal Crossing Fangame

Language: German

Game: Visual Novel

Genre:  Slice of Life

Setting: Apocalypse

Stage:  Prototype/Prologue (WIP)

Description

Genji doesn't know where the monster-looking-angels came from, but he sure as hell doesn't want them in his hometown! They seem peaceful, albeit creepy, nonetheless does he take all his courage to face them, with a kendo sword in hand. He is terribly scared though...but is there another way, to get his world back to normal? 

This is just a short prologue so that you can imagine what the Visual Novel sorta will be like.
developers: a rose a day keeps the doctors away
